channel.title: League of Legends on my old Windows XP
channel.description: I am about to attempt the impossible on my other computer! (Windows XP.) It's a 1.50 GB ram and shes still goin! :D I will play a game on this piece of shit tomorrow when it's done downloading. I think I got this computer in 2004 and never went on it since 2007. I now have an alienware with windows ultimate. :) your welcum fer teh lulz <3 .... if this made you laugh. [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/28mobpj.jpg[/img]
